interpretation:
The "postbox" card represents communication and connection. It is a symbol of receiving or sending messages, news, or information. This card can also indicate the need for patience as messages may take time to arrive. It reminds us to stay open to communication and to be receptive to the messages that come our way.

Reversed, this card can indicate a lack of communication or a delay in receiving important messages. It can also suggest that we may need to be more proactive in reaching out to others or in expressing ourselves.

Overall, the "postbox" card encourages us to stay open and connected, and to trust that the messages we receive are part of our journey.
